feed.title: Andrea Grandi - HowTo, Linux, Maemo (EN), Skype

entry.title: Skype on N770 (using Os2007 HE)
entry.summary:
Great news for all [N770]{style="font-weight: bold;"} users! Someone discovered that is possible to make [Skype]{style="font-weight: bold;"} run on N770 with [Os2007 HE]{style="font-weight: bold;"}.

All you have to do is follow these steps:

1. Install skype-ui through Application Manager

2. Download this package in your PC and extract the file named [skyhost]{style="font-weight: bold;"}

3. Find a way to copy the file skyhost to your maemo device in /usr/bin

4. execute this from root on your device:

chown user:users /usr/bin/skyhost

That's all! You can find more information on the original post.
entry.content:
Great news for all [N770]{style="font-weight: bold;"} users! Someone discovered that is possible to make [Skype]{style="font-weight: bold;"} run on N770 with [Os2007 HE]{style="font-weight: bold;"}.

All you have to do is follow these steps:

1. Install skype-ui through Application Manager

2. Download this package in your PC and extract the file named [skyhost]{style="font-weight: bold;"}

3. Find a way to copy the file skyhost to your maemo device in /usr/bin

4. execute this from root on your device:

chown user:users /usr/bin/skyhost

That's all! You can find more information on the original post.
